data.text:
For over 38 years, the Texas Demographic Center has monitored, produced, interpreted, and disseminated the best, most accurate, and objective demographic and socioeconomic data we can identify about our greatest asset, the people of Texas. The TDC provides technical assistance and training for the use and application of these data. Annually, the TDC processes hundreds of requests for data, presentations, expert testimony, media interviews, and custom analysis. The Population Estimates and Projections Program at the TDC produces annual estimates and biennial projections of the state and counties with demographic detail. The TDC serves data users by: Providing a data repository of demographic and socioeconomic information from the Census bureau and other trusted sources; Disseminating demographic trends and projections in reports, briefs, maps, and presentations; Providing training and technical expertise in the use of data from various sources; Providing technical expertise and assistance in the creation of demographic web applications and dashboards; and Performing custom data analysis for users with specific demographic research questions. The TDC also maintains an extensive library including research briefs and publications, infographics, presentations, and webinars.

Website

https://demographics.texas.gov/
